NetSquid package
================

In the schematic below the sub-packages that make up the NetSquid package are shown stacked in relation to each other and the pyDynAA package dependency.
The main classes and modules in each (sub-)package are highlighted, and their relationships in terms of inheritance, composition, and aggregation are also shown.

.. image:: _static/netsquidstack_detailed.png
    :align: center
    :width: 500px

The subpackages are documented in the next sections, including example snippets.
This documentation is automatically generated using Python docstrings
(using the `autodoc extension <http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/ext/autodoc.html>`_).

.. toctree::
    :caption: Subpackages
    :maxdepth: 2

    netsquid.qubits
    netsquid.components
    netsquid.components.models
    netsquid.nodes
    netsquid.protocols
    netsquid.util
    netsquid.examples
